TopicTitle: Help! My docking ports won't connect!

Articles.Content:
Why won't my custom docking ports connect? They don't show anything with staging or other options either. What am I doing wrong?

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/uq3fwj6ebu78ntv/AACDAzKE6PfX9gPgDCmqU_Pea?dl=0
Moved to General Mod Development Help and Support section.
You need to add an empty object plain axis labelled "dockingNode" and orient it correctly to your part. Load up one of KSP's docking ports if you can to see.
